content.rendered:
Betting industry in Kenya is growing at a rapid rate as more people familiarize with their services. Betsafi hasn’t been on the market for long, but is already causing a lot of buzz. The site comes with many features, allowing it to compete side by side with the other older platforms. if looking for a gambling site that has all the advanced new features for an exciting experience, look no further. Read below all the information you need to learn about this betting site that is taking Kenya by storm.

What is Betsafi?

It is a company by Downtown Bets that provides safe and secure services to gamblers. Betsafi is a licensed betting platform approved by the Betting Control and Licensing Board. This makes it a legitimate site that players can fully trust to protect their personal data.

Why Betsafi?

Every player wants to use a site that makes their gambling experience fantastic. Check the pros of using Betsafi and why you should consider making it your favorite platform.

  • Offers a wide variety of games
  • Fast, safe and secure transactions
  • Good odds
  • Simple registration process
  • Offers live games
  • Offers online games and virtuals
  • A diverse site

Betsafi Bonuses

The term bonus is music to players’ ears. It is money that you had not anticipated and can increase your earnings if played right. Betsafi offers three types of bonuses that you can take advantage of;

  • Betsafi Boost
  • Karibu Stake Back
  • Virtual Boost

Karibu Bonus

Karibu is a Swahili term meaning welcome. This feature targets new members and seeks to give them another opportunity to play, should they lose on their first bet. Expect a 100% stake back bonus if you are unlucky the first time you play on this bookmaker. The maximum amount you can receive is Kshs. 2500. With such an offer, your start at this betting platform will be a good one regardless of the outcome of your first bet.

BetsafiBoost

All members who use the multibet feature are awarded a bonus. To qualify players must place at least 10 bets. Secondly, the money you use to place this bet should be from your cash deposit. If you already have other bonus amounts in your account, you cannot use it to play for a BetsafiBoost.

Virtual Boost

Playing virtual games comes with many advantages. The more virtual bets ou play the higher your chances of winning this bonus. Also, the amount increases depending on what level you are playing.

How to open a Betsafi Account

Players get two options when registering an account: SMS and online registration

  1. 1.      SMS Registration
  2. Open Messages on your phone
  3. Type the word JOIN
  4. Send this message to 29277
  5. An SMS confirmation message will be sent to you including your username, password, and paybill number for making deposits.
  6.  
  7. 2.      Online registration

Follow these steps for a quick registration process.

  • Visit betsafi.com.
  • Click Register button at the top right corner.
  • Enter your phone number.
  • A registration code will be sent to your number.
  • Verify your account by entering this code on the site.
  • Create a password twice to confirm it.
  • Check the Agree to terms and conditions box and confirm that you are at least 18 years of age.
  • Activate your account by clicking on Submit.

How to reset your Betsafi password

You’ll be prompted to reset your password by changing the one generated by the system. You can apply this same procedure whenever you forget your password.

  •  Log in.
  • Click forgot password.
  • Enter your phone number.
  • Click forgot password button again
  • You’ll receive an sms with a reset pin

How to use MPESA to make deposits

So far the only available method of making deposits on this site is through MPESA. Open the Mpesa feature on your phone>>paybill>>299560>>fill BETSAFI as the account number>>amount>>Pin>>confirm.

The money will be available in your account ready for use, and you’ll receive a message confirming this.

How to use sms feature to make deposits

Send a message to 29277 that reads, DP*Amount. DP stands for deposit while amount is the specific figure that you wish to credit your account with. You’ll have to authorize the payment by filling in your MPESA pin.

How to deposit through the website

Alternatively, you can still deposit through the Betsafi website. Under the My Account tab, select Deposit. Enter a specific amount then Submit. Confirm by entering your PIN when the message shows on your screen.

Learn more about Scorepesa

How to withdraw from Betsafi

Withdrawal processes work similarly to deposits, and you can do this either online or via sms. Write this code, WD*Amount on your messages and send to 29277. Immediately, your winnings will be credited to your MPESA account.

Summary

Betsafi has upgraded betting ways with its numerous features and games. Since it’s a licensed company, players can feel free to use the platform without having to worry about being scammed. Whether you wish to play virtual, live games, jackpots, or other sporting events, the site has it all.

A complete guide of how BungaBet works
